title: Provided that, in case of combination, Business or mercantile use shall not be less than 10% of the admissible FSI
clause_text: Provided that, in case of combination, Business or mercantile use shall not be less than 10% of the admissible FSI. Provided further that the area of all such plots taken together in the zone from Node shall not exceed 15% of the area of the relevant zone from the Node.
section: (#) 10.10.1 Basic FSI Permissible for Certain Categories of Plots.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
